sense.gloss: to tie, to bind, to fasten
to restrict (freedom), to tie down (with rules, regulations, etc.), to fetter

sdata.j: アメリカはしば|しばる|つぼと↑言↑↓い↓われる。
sdata.e: America is often referred to as a melting pot.

sdata.j: ↑歯↑↓は↓を↑食↑↓く↓い↑縛↑↓|しば↓る|、↑喉元↑↓のどもと↓までせりあがった↑感情↑↓かんじょう↓を↑強引↑↓ごういん↓に↑飲↑↓の↓み↑込↑↓こ↓む。
sdata.e: He grits his teeth and forces back his growing fear.
